data.name: Kelpxolotl
data.description: Kelpxolotl make great hosuehold pets due to their ability to adapt to different bodies of water. It is said that the kelp that grows from Kelpxolotl are extremely tasty.

data.name: Ignepig
data.description: Ignepig can generate massive amount of heat from their bodies allowing their fur to combust. Because of this, Ignepig are the leading cause of house fires.

data.name: Shurtle
data.description: Despite looking like a turtle, Shurtle are more closely related to fungus. They can often be found sleeping on fallen trees and other decomposing plant matter.

data.name: Bushlin
data.description: Bushlin are known for their ability to camouflage themselves in the forest. They are often mistaken for rocks or leaves.

data.name: Rojobin
data.description: Rojobin are known for their beautiful red feathers. They are often seen flying in the sky during the day.

data.name: Mimposter
data.description: Mimposter is a mysterious creature that is said to be able to take on the form of anything it sees. It is said that Mimposters can be found in the darkest corners of the world.
